0.0.2.en: crash fix when more then 10 devices

0.0.4.en: bug fixes, note: restart app when you no longer get external updates from nhc.

0.1.0.en: Added support for the Niko thermostat, bug fixes

0.2.0.en: Reworked connections to NHC, reduced amount of connections, centralised to general app settings. When updating the ip needs to be set in a new app setting. General bug fixes related to tcp connection timeouts.
